Literature Review: The discovery of silkworm resistance to Bombyx mori nucleopolyhedrovirus (BmNPV) has been an active area of research in recent years. The development of disease-resistant varieties is crucial for the sericulture industry, which accounts for a significant portion of the world's silk production. In this review, we summarize the current knowledge on the mechanisms of silkworm resistance to BmNPV and discuss the recent advances in the field.
